summary: Apex predator of logistics efficiency. 15+ years architecting bullet-proof dispatch systems for 60+ daily fuel-type moves across CA/NV. Self-taught automation engineer who eliminates human latency—40% admin reduction, 99% OTD. Ready to own your rack-to-retail fuel cycle overnight.

bullets: Commanded 60+ daily outbound agricultural loads to Walmart/Costco—99% on-time fuel-grade precision across CA/NV.
Designed custom scheduling engine that cut driver downtime 30% and maximized fleet utilization; replicated for fuel dispatch.
Maintained audit-ready DOT logs, pre-trip inspections, and maintenance records—zero roadside failures.
Resolved real-time delivery exceptions; 4.9 carrier score via relentless communication and geographic mastery.
Built Python/Selenium bots that slashed manual data entry 40%—translates to instant rack-price uploads and invoice reconciliation.
Deployed secure API layer (JWT/Okta) protecting sensitive driver and route data; fuel fraud surface = 0.
Architected Apache Genie CLI for one-command server spin-up—keeps dispatch systems alive 99.99% uptime.
Own after-hours diagnostics; restored critical ops in <15 min.
Self-dispatched 150+ stops/day across CA Central Valley—perfect on-time metric via micro-route optimization.
Handled live customer calls, resolved retain issues, updated delivery confirmations in real time.
Maintained 4.9+ performance rating—same rigor applied to fuel delivery windows.
Negotiated fuel-type freight rates with 500+ carriers; engineered automated tracking & invoicing, +25% throughput.
Integrated TMS and CRM—single source of truth for load status and customer visibility.

education: A.S. Computer Science (in progress) – Modesto Junior College
